name: Natural Baby Alpaca Wrap SPANISH RED
description:
100% BABY ALPACA SHAWL
 Machine Woven
 Lightweight                                                              
 Hand Tied fringes                                                       
 Size 70cm x 200cm
 Weight 190 grams 
 
Color SPANISH RED  

Beautiful lightweight natural Baby Alpaca shawl. Baby Alpaca is the first clipping of a sheared alpaca animal. The fibre is classified as a luxury fibre. It has natural thermal properties and is warmer than wool. It has no itchy factor and does not peel.
